name: FAIRY MAHJONG HALLOWEEN Game
description:
Fairy Mahjong Halloween is a highly innovative and addictive 3D, skill-based, unique mahjong game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun games on the Apple App Store.

Fairy Mahjong Halloween combines mahjongg and match three game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.
Playing Fairy Mahjong Halloween is very simple: find and match three of identical tiles. Match all tiles to complete a board.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements
